name: nimbus/ros2-slam-toolbox-mapping
description:
Slam toolbox in ROS2, mapping algorithm
License: LGPL

parameters.name: solver_plugin
parameters.description: The type of nonlinear solver to utilize for karto's scan solver.

parameters.name: ceres_linear_solver
parameters.description: The linear solver for Ceres to use.

parameters.name: ceres_preconditioner
parameters.description: The preconditioner to use with that solver.

parameters.name: ceres_trust_strategy
parameters.description: The trust region strategy. Line searach strategies are not exposed because they perform poorly for this use.

parameters.name: ceres_dogleg_type
parameters.description: The dogleg strategy to use if the trust strategy is DOGLEG.

parameters.name: ceres_loss_function
parameters.description: The type of loss function to reject outlier measurements. None is equatable to a squared loss.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: 'mapping' or 'localization' mode for performance optimizations in the Ceres problem creation.

parameters.name: odom_frame
parameters.description: Odometry frame.

parameters.name: map_frame
parameters.description: Map frame.

parameters.name: base_frame
parameters.description: Base frame.

parameters.name: scan_topic
parameters.description: Scan topic, absolute path, ei /scan not scan.

parameters.name: debug_logging
parameters.description: Change logger to debug.

parameters.name: throttle_scans
parameters.description: Number of scans to throttle in synchronous mode.

parameters.name: transform_publish_period
parameters.description: The map to odom transform publish period. 0 will not publish transforms.

parameters.name: map_update_interval
parameters.description: Interval to update the 2D occupancy map for other applications / visualization.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Resolution of the 2D occupancy map to generate.

parameters.name: max_laser_range
parameters.description: Maximum laser range to use for 2D occupancy map rastering.

parameters.name: minimum_time_interval
parameters.description: The minimum duration of time between scans to be processed in synchronous mode.

parameters.name: transform_timeout
parameters.description: TF timeout for looking up transforms.

parameters.name: tf_buffer_duration
parameters.description: Duration to store TF messages for lookup. Set high if running offline at multiple times speed in synchronous mode.

parameters.name: stack_size_to_use
parameters.description: The number of bytes to reset the stack size to, to enable serialization/deserialization of files. A liberal default is 40000000, but less is fine.

parameters.name: enable_interactive_mode
parameters.description: Whether or not to allow for interactive mode to be enabled. Interactive mode will retain a cache of laser scans mapped to their ID for visualization in interactive mode.

parameters.name: use_scan_matching
parameters.description: Whether to use scan matching to refine odometric pose.

parameters.name: use_scan_barycenter
parameters.description: Whether to use the barycenter or scan pose.

parameters.name: minimum_travel_distance
parameters.description: Minimum distance of travel before processing a new scan.

parameters.name: minimum_travel_heading
parameters.description: Minimum changing in heading to justify an update.

parameters.name: scan_buffer_size
parameters.description: The number of scans to buffer into a chain, also used as the number of scans in the circular buffer of localization mode.

parameters.name: scan_buffer_maximum_scan_distance
parameters.description: Maximum distance of a scan from the pose before removing the scan from the buffer.

parameters.name: link_match_minimum_response_fine
parameters.description: The threshold link matching algorithm response for fine resolution to pass.

parameters.name: link_scan_maximum_distance
parameters.description: Maximum distance between linked scans to be valid.

parameters.name: loop_search_maximum_distance
parameters.description: Maximum threshold of distance for scans to be considered for loop closure.

parameters.name: do_loop_closing
parameters.description: Whether to do loop closure (if you're not sure, the answer is 'true').

parameters.name: loop_match_minimum_chain_size
parameters.description: The minimum chain length of scans to look for loop closure.

parameters.name: loop_match_maximum_variance_coarse
parameters.description: The threshold variance in coarse search to pass to refine.

parameters.name: loop_match_minimum_response_coarse
parameters.description: The threshold response of the loop closure algorithm in coarse search to pass to refine.

parameters.name: loop_match_minimum_response_fine
parameters.description: The threshold response of the loop closure algorithm in fine search to pass to refine.

parameters.name: correlation_search_space_dimension
parameters.description: Search grid size to do scan correlation over.

parameters.name: correlation_search_space_resolution
parameters.description: Search grid resolution to do scan correlation over.

parameters.name: correlation_search_space_smear_deviation
parameters.description: Amount of multimodal smearing to smooth out responses.

parameters.name: loop_search_space_dimension
parameters.description: Size of the search grid over the loop closure algorithm.

parameters.name: loop_search_space_resolution
parameters.description: Search grid resolution to do loop closure over.

parameters.name: loop_search_space_smear_deviation
parameters.description: Amount of multimodal smearing to smooth out responses.

parameters.name: distance_variance_penalty
parameters.description: A penalty to apply to a matched scan as it differs from the odometric pose.

parameters.name: angle_variance_penalty
parameters.description: A penalty to apply to a matched scan as it differs from the odometric pose.

parameters.name: fine_search_angle_offset
parameters.description: Range of angles to test for fine scan matching.

parameters.name: coarse_search_angle_offset
parameters.description: Range of angles to test for coarse scan matching.

parameters.name: coarse_angle_resolution
parameters.description: Resolution of angles over the Offset range to test in scan matching.

parameters.name: minimum_angle_penalty
parameters.description: Smallest penalty an angle can have to ensure the size doesn't blow up.

parameters.name: minimum_distance_penalty
parameters.description: Smallest penalty a scan can have to ensure the size doesn't blow up.

parameters.name: use_response_expansion
parameters.description: Whether to automatically increase the search grid size if no viable match is found.

inputStreams.name: scan
inputStreams.description: The input scan from your laser to utilize.

inputStreams.name: odom
inputStreams.description: A valid transform from your configured odom_frame to base_frame.

outputStreams.name: map
outputStreams.description: Occupancy grid representation of the pose-graph at map_update_interval frequency.

outputStreams.name: robot_pose
outputStreams.description: TF from map to base_link, the position of the robot on the map.
